/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with brick buildings, their red and brown hues adding a touch of warmth to the urban landscape. These buildings house various shops and restaurants, inviting passersby to explore their offerings. Cars and bicycles are parked along the street, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
